hours: Monday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM Wednesday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM Thursday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM Tuesday: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM Friday: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM
materials: Books (Reuse); Clothing; Gift Bags; Household Goods; Ornaments; Reusable Appliance Donation; Cables & Connectors; Cell Phones; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; DVD Players/Blu-Ray Players/DVRs; Electronics; Laptop Computers; MP3 Players; Computer Peripherals; Portable Media Players; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; VCRs; Video Game Systems; Blu-Ray Players; Digital Converter Boxes; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Donations are accepted during normal business hours up until one hour prior to closing. Items should be clean, in good repair (no stains or tears) and in workable condition. We do not accept appliances, large furniture, textbooks or encyclopedias. If in doubt, please call before bringing the item to the shop.

Donations and volunteers are always welcome!  For more information about volunteering or donations please contact Deanna Ownby at (708) 485-2324.
